greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = number of the round in which n is removed in the Flavius sieve, 0 if it is never removed (when n is one of the terms of A000960).
comment: a(n) = index of the row where n is located in array A278507, 0 if n  does not occur there (when n is one of the terms of A000960).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10707
Index entries for sequences related to the Josephus Problem
program: ;; Very crude. Find it with two nested loops. (Maybe a closed form exists?)

(define (A278528 n) (cond ((not (zero? (A278169 n))) 0) ((even? n) 1) (else (let searchrow ((row 2)) (let searchcol ((col 1)) (cond ((>= (A278507bi row col) n) (if (= (A278507bi row col) n) row (searchrow (+ 1 row)))) (else (searchcol (+ 1 col)))))))))
;; Code for A278507bi given in A278507.
xref: Cf. A278507, A278529 (the other index), A278538.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 23 2016
